title: Ticket #4817: Implement "request_wallclock"
description:
A new HTCondor user asked "how do I limit the runtime of a job" on IRC and I managed to answer him incorrectly (to be fair, bcotton also gave incorrect advice). We only managed a correct answer on the third try -- and we're the "experts"!

I think it's about time to provide a first-class "request_walltime" in condor_submit that handles this for the user.

I'm not sure what the correct semantics are (we'll have to hammer this out in a design doc), but I wanted to at least get the basic idea "in writing".
creator: bbockelm
